channel.title: How can I create custom items?
channel.description: Can someone please tell me how can I create some custom items? Just like other items but different colors or with different names and stats... Please help!!!

item.title: How can I create custom items?
item.dc:creator: @bhill bhill
item.description:
@bhill wrote:

Read the TUT’s on creating custom items / recolouring but for Item stats go into item.CFG file and find the item name of the item you want to Modify the stats on.

Read full topic
